sentences.en: All traffic have to take a diversion and rejoin the motorway 10 - km further on.
sentences.cn: 所有的车辆都必须改道而行,可在前方10公里处,重新回到机动车道上.

sentences.en: Henry has apologized for his bad behaviour and should be allowed to rejoin the group with a clean sheet.
sentences.cn: 亨利对他过去的不端行为表示歉意,如果今后不再重犯错误,应该被允许重新加入这个小组.

sentences.en: However, he is now back running and could soon rejoin his teammates in full training.
sentences.cn: 然而, 现在他可以开始跑步恢复了,很快就能加入球队的正常训练.

sentences.en: I have to rejoin the fleet.
sentences.cn: 我不得不去回到舰队去.

sentences.en: It also said the country should rejoin the Treaty on the Nonproliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
sentences.cn: 决议还要求朝鲜重回《不扩散核武器条约》的立场.

sentences.en: Nagase All remaining squadrons, rejoin into attack formation.
sentences.cn: 残余部队重整编队,再次进入攻击阵形.

sentences.en: No player can rejoin the game after being replaced by a substitute.
sentences.cn: 被替换下场的球员不能重新参加比赛.

sentences.en: Sergio Ramos and Diarra have yet to rejoin the squad.
sentences.cn: 塞尔吉奥·拉莫斯和迪亚拉将重返队伍.

sentences.en: She had meant to drive down to the quay and rejoin the yacht.
sentences.cn: 她原打算乘车到码头重返游轮.

sentences.en: She rejoined her friends in the lounge.
sentences.cn: 她回到休息室和朋友们待在一起。

sentences.en: She should strain a point to rejoin him.
sentences.cn: 她应该克服成见同他结合.

sentences.en: The prime minister of Fiji has said Fiji is in no hurry to rejoin the Commonwealth.
sentences.cn: 斐济总理称斐济并不急于重返英联邦。

sentences.en: They hastened to Kobe to rejoin the ship.
sentences.cn: 他们赶到神户,返回船上.

sentences.en: They may decide whether they want to rejoin the community.
sentences.cn: 他们可以决定是否愿意重新加入这个团体.

sentences.en: When destroyed, some Necron Warriors may reassemble themselves and rejoin the battle.
sentences.cn: 当破坏, 一些Necron战士可能重新召集他们自己而且再加入战争.

words.tran_cn: 反驳；回答；（被告的）[法] 第二次答辩

trans.tran_cn: 使再结合, 再加入, 再回答
trans.tran_en: to say (something) in reply; answer, reply, or retort

trans.tran_cn: 重新会合，重新接合，答辩，回答
重新加入，重返，再回答，与…再会合
